title: Psychic Nightmare
description: You wake drenched in sweat, your necklace burning against your chest. The dream was vivid — a cathedral of flesh, a choir of screaming mouths, and a voice saying your name. Just your name. Over and over.

outcomes.description: You grip the anxiety ring and force the vision away. The Emperor protects. The Emperor protects. The Emperor protects.
The vision lingers. You see a face in the dream — one of the cultists? A victim? You can't tell. But you remember every detail.

choices.text: Recite the Litany of Protection and push the dream away.
Force yourself to remember the details. They might be useful.

title: Warp Echo
description: During your meditation, you feel a pulse in the Warp — like a heartbeat, deep and slow. It resonates with your own psychic frequency. The Whispering Choir is active again.

outcomes.description: You shut out the echo and reinforce your mental wards. Your training holds. The Emperor's light burns steady in your mind.
You open yourself to the echo, just slightly. Images flood in — a location, a ritual chamber, hooded figures chanting. You now know where the next ritual will take place.

choices.text: Reinforce your mental wards. Do not listen.
Open yourself to the Warp echo. Gather intelligence.

title: Drax's Warning
description: Throne Agent Drax corners you in the corridor. His hand rests on his shock maul. His eyes are hard.

outcomes.description: Drax grunts. 'Maybe you're different. Maybe.' He walks away. It's not friendship. But it's not open hostility either.
Drax's grip tightens on his maul. 'I've got my eye on you, witch.' He stalks off. The contempt is thick enough to cut.
Something shifts in Drax's eyes. Surprise. Grudging respect. He releases the maul. 'You've got nerve, psyker. I'll give you that.' He offers his hand.

choices.text: "I'm not your enemy, Drax. I'm the weapon they pointed at the real enemy."
Say nothing. Keep your eyes down. Let him have his moment of dominance.
"Touch that maul and I'll show you what a sanctioned psyker can do to a man's nervous system."

title: Underhive Patrol
description: Your patrol through the underhive corridors reveals signs of recent activity — fresh boot prints in the fungal growth, a discarded cult pamphlet, the faint smell of incense that doesn't belong down here.

outcomes.description: You follow the trail carefully and discover a hidden cache — cult documents and a handful of thrones, left behind in haste.
The trail leads to an ambush. Hooded figures emerge from the shadows. You fight your way clear, but not without cost.

choices.text: Follow the trail carefully, checking for traps.
Follow the trail quickly before it goes cold.

title: Seren's Lesson
description: Astropath Seren sends a telepathic summons — a gentle warmth behind your eyes, like sunlight through closed lids. She waits in the Sanctum.

outcomes.description: Seren teaches you a technique for strengthening your mental wards. Your mind feels clearer, more focused. The Warp's whispers grow distant.

Seren shares a fragment of her vast experience. You glimpse the Emperor's light through her soul-bond — a brilliance that burns but does not consume. For a moment, you understand what it means to be truly sanctioned.

choices.text: Ask her to teach you stronger mental wards.
Ask her about the Soul Binding. What did she see when she stood before the Emperor?
